title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.15 - Affirmative action program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.15 - Affirmative action program

State Regulations

An affirmative action program for each project and program
receiving financial assistance from the corporation hereunder shall be
developed by the affirmative action department of the corporation in
consultation with the recipient of financial assistance and any other involved
party. Compliance with the affirmative action program and with provisions
prohibiting discrimination in employment or hiring on the basis of age, race, creed, color, national origin, sex, disability or marital status, shall be
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4212.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
